name: Druddigon
description: The Cave Pokémon. It races through narrow caves, using its sharp claws to catch prey. The skin on its face is harder than a rock.

abilities.name: Rough Skin
abilities.description: When this Pokémon is hit by a melee attack, it may roll a d4. On a 4, deal an amount of typeless damage equal to its proficiency modifier to its attacker.

abilities.name: Sheer Force
abilities.description: When activating a move that has a chance to impose a stat change or inflict a status, this creature instead doubles its move modifier for the damage with no chance of the additional effect.

abilities.name: Mold Breaker
abilities.description: This Pokémon's moves ignore any abilities that would lessen their effect or ability to hit an opponent (Due to things like Water Absorb, Snow Cloak, Thick Fat, Sturdy, etc.)
